CustomField.description: Current Payroll Status = 1 Not Contributing Payroll Status = 0 Behind or Never Contributed Payroll Status = -1
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Payroll_Submission_Status__c , "Current"),1, IF( ISPICKVAL( Payroll_Submission_Status__c , "Implementation"),1, IF( ISPICKVAL( Payroll_Submission_Status__c , ""),0, IF( ISPICKVAL( Payroll_Submission_Status__c , "Not Contributing"),0, -1))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Current Payroll Status = 1 Not Contributing Payroll Status = 0 Behind or Never Contributed Payroll Status = -1
CustomField.label: Payroll HM Score (Deprecated)
